life.threedee

Interface ThreeDeeObject

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Consumable, Energizer, GhostHouseDoor, GhostPlane, MapPlane, Pellet, Plane, SpecialPointsConsumable, TexturedPlane, Triangle, TunnelPlane, WorldObject

    public interface ThreeDeeObject

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Color c()
      Returns the color of the object
      double calculateT(Vector v, Point p)
      Calculates the scalar value the vector v must be multiplied by for the vector to span from the point to called on given object
      TColorTransfer getRData(Vector v, Point p, double minT)
      Returns the t value (see calculateT), color, and this for the given direction, point, and minimum t value.
      Point intersection(Vector v, Point p)
      Calculate the intersection point of the line represented by the point and the vector and this
      Point intersection(Vector v, Point p, double t)
      Calculates the intersection point given the t value.
      boolean sameSide(Point a, Point b)
      Returns whether or not the two points are on the same side of the object
      void translate(Vector v)
      Translates this by the given Vector

      • getRData

        TColorTransfer getRData(Vector v,
                      Point p,
                      double minT)
        Returns the t value (see calculateT), color, and this for the given direction, point, and minimum t value. The minT is passed so as to avoid calculating color if it will not be used anyways.
        Parameters:
        v -
        p -
        minT -
        Returns:

      • intersection

        Point intersection(Vector v,
                 Point p,
                 double t)
        Calculates the intersection point given the t value. Note: all this does is multiply the vector by t and add it to the point
